1class ToolBarItem {
2  defaultIcon: string | Resource
3  activeIcon: string | Resource
4  label: string
5}
6
7@Entry
8@Component
9struct Index {
10  @State
11  activeIndex: number = 0
12  toolBars: ToolBarItem[] = [
13    { defaultIcon: $r('app.media.home'), activeIcon: $r('app.media.home_select'), label: 'é¦–é¡µ' },
14    { defaultIcon: $r('app.media.project'), activeIcon: $r('app.media.project_select'), label: 'é¡¹ç›®' },
15    { defaultIcon: $r('app.media.interview'), activeIcon: $r('app.media.interview_select'), label: 'é¢ç»' },
16    { defaultIcon: $r('app.media.mine'), activeIcon: $r('app.media.mine_select'), label: 'æˆ‘çš„' }
17  ]
18
19  @Builder
20  TabBarBuilder(item: ToolBarItem, index: number) {
21    Column() {
22      Image(this.activeIndex === index ? item.activeIcon : item.defaultIcon)
23        .width(24)
24      Text(item.label)
25        .fontSize(12)
26        .margin({ top: 4 })
27        .lineHeight(12)
28        .fontColor(this.activeIndex === index ? '#000' : '#aaa')
29    }
30  }
31
32  build() {
33    Tabs() {
34      ForEach(this.toolBars, (item: ToolBarItem, index: number) => {
35        TabContent() {
36          Text(index.toString())
37        }
38        .tabBar(this.TabBarBuilder(item, index))
39      })
40    }
41    .barPosition(BarPosition.End)
42    .onChange(index => this.activeIndex = index)
43  }
44}

8const req = http.createHttp()
9
10@Entry
11@Component
12struct Index {
13  @State
14  showCart: boolean = false
15
16  @State
17  categoryList: Category[] = []
18
19  aboutToAppear() {
20    req.request('http://172.16.39.26:3000/takeaway')
21      .then(res => {
22        const data = JSON.parse(res.result as string) as Category[]
23        this.categoryList = data
24      })
25      .catch(err => {
26        console.error('MEITU', err.message)
27      })
28  }
29

31    Stack({ alignContent: Alignment.Bottom }) {
32      Column() {
33        Nav()

35      }
36      .width('100%')
37      .height('100%')
38
39      if (this.showCart) {
40        Cart()
41      }

43    }
44  }
45}

2ï¼‰è´­ç‰©è½¦æ·»åŠ é€»è¾‘

utils/index.ets
1import { CartItem, FoodItem } from '../models'
2
3export const CART_KEY = 'CART_KEY'
4
5export const getCart = () => {
6  return JSON.parse(AppStorage.Get(CART_KEY) || '[]') as CartItem[]
7}
8
9export const addCart = (food: FoodItem) => {
10  const cart = getCart()
11  const f = cart.find(f => f.id === food.id)
12  if (f) {
13    f.count++
14  } else {
15    const { id, price, picture, name } = food
16    cart.unshift({
17      id,
18      price,
19      picture,
20      name,
21      count: 1
22    })
23  }
24  AppStorage.Set(CART_KEY, JSON.stringify(cart))
25}

3export const delCart = (id: number) => {
4  const cart = getCart()
5  const f = cart.find(f => f.id === id)
6  if (f && f.count > 0) {
7    f.count--
8  }
9  AppStorage.Set(CART_KEY, JSON.stringify(cart))
10}
